author: mmasciov
body:
### PR description:

Backport of #48701.

As per title, this PR aims at adapting the ClusterTPAssociationProducer to deal with two strip cluster product IDs, following #48684 and its backport #48685, in view of the next HLT menu for 2025.
In addition, all relevant HLT validation modules are adapted for the foreseen changes.

NOTE: this should ideally be included together with the PR that will introduce the new menu, foreseen for next week.

### PR validation:

The PR was validated with the updated HLT menu foreseen for August 18.

FYI: @cms-sw/tracking-pog-l2, @missirol, @mmusich
title: [15.0.X] Adapt ClusterTPAssociationProducer to deal with two strip cluster product IDs
